channel.title: Whats the best way to drop trade?
channel.description:
Well I'm making a new pure and don't say "wild is gone no more pur3" `cause theres 1 on 1 now and it's just as good. (For me at least.)So lets say I want to drop trade 1mil, whats the best way?
*Thanks in advance

item.title: Whats the best way to drop trade?
item.dc:creator: @OmidSan OmidSan
item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

exe626:

Haha, that’s how I make money/get food OmidSan.

Lol Are you a Memb.? I’ve played since like 02-03 and still haven’t become a memb lol.

[quote=“Taharok, post:27, topic:186872”]Firstly, Bounty Hunter was updated. You can only attack your intended target and the people by which you are their target can only attack you.

Secondly, all shop prices are based on a general price which the Grand Exchange prices fluctuate around (depending on the popularity of an item.)

The only way to transfer money from account to account is by merchanting it through the Grand Exchange. However, you need to realize that trying to transfer 1m could mean you would loose up to 1.5m and spend several hours getting it over. On top of that, you would need some sort of starting price on the account you are trading it to to fully make the transfer. It is complicated and really not worth anyone’s time.[/quote]
I know, but it still sucks. Anyone teles to you at anytime, everyone brings full rune and runs away like sissies when you start attacking.
F2p Pking sucks.
I bet p2p is probably a little better.
And Pures and The Wilderness were what Runescape was about back then.
Without it Runescape is just… a MMORPG. Pking owned. That’s what about 70-80% F2pers did. Others just skilled.

Read full topic
item.source: Whats the best way to drop trade?

item.title: Whats the best way to drop trade?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Firstly, Bounty Hunter was updated. You can only attack your intended target and the people by which you are their target can only attack you.

Secondly, all shop prices are based on a general price which the Grand Exchange prices fluctuate around (depending on the popularity of an item.)

The only way to transfer money from account to account is by merchanting it through the Grand Exchange. However, you need to realize that trying to transfer 1m could mean you would loose up to 1.5m and spend several hours getting it over. On top of that, you would need some sort of starting price on the account you are trading it to to fully make the transfer. It is complicated and really not worth anyone’s time.

Read full topic
item.source: Whats the best way to drop trade?

item.title: Whats the best way to drop trade?
item.dc:creator: @OmidSan OmidSan
item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

:S how would either acc get a santa.

And I’m sure jagex did a thorough job so there would be like no possible way to trade between accs.

The only way is BH that can be done quickly
any other way will take a long time

So just skill up your pure. Fish and sell for money. Don’t bother cooking lobs if you wanna make fast cash. You can sell raw and buy cooked cheaper.

Read full topic
item.source: Whats the best way to drop trade?

Is it possible to go to a least crowded world, sell a Santa hat in general store for 2gp and get another account to buy it?

item.source: Whats the best way to drop trade?

item.title: Whats the best way to drop trade?
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:20, topic:186872”][quote author=exe626 link=topic=249397.msg2094171#msg2094171 date=1204948251]
.[quote author=Taharok link=topic=249397.msg2093620#msg2093620 date=1204932623]

Huh? You make 1 million gp in iron legs(auto mine or something?), just make enough iron legs to build up in the trade screen. Then, trade them to w/e account of yours for 1 million gp in cash.

What is the point of doing that? You won’t make any money. You are actually loosing cash because 1m of it is going back to a useless account.
[/quote]I wanna see you sell 1m gp in iron legs. I know you wont because it isn’t probable. The thing is, they’re highly disposable. You can make a ton of them really fast and just trade them to your lower level.
[/quote]

It is possible, just improbably. You need something that can be made easier (since iron has a 50% chance on smelting) that is as good as or better than iron legs when it comes to throwing them away.[/quote]
My friend told me you can do it throught bounty hunter on diffrent javas multi login. I dont think so though.

Read full topic
item.source: Whats the best way to drop trade?

item.title: Whats the best way to drop trade?
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

I see what you’re saying. You’re basically looking for something that can be mass produced and easily disposable. Like, maple long bows or willow long bows.

Read full topic

What is the point of doing that? You won’t make any money. You are actually loosing cash because 1m of it is going back to a useless account.
[/quote]I wanna see you sell 1m gp in iron legs. I know you wont because it isn’t probable. The thing is, they’re highly disposable. You can make a ton of them really fast and just trade them to your lower level.[/quote]

It is possible, just improbably. You need something that can be made easier (since iron has a 50% chance on smelting) that is as good as or better than iron legs when it comes to throwing them away.

item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich

@_Rich wrote:

Double log, buy an item or 2 worth your 1m cash, kill your other account in bounty hunter, tank it out for 3minutes without dieing, and there you go.

Only way i’ve heard of so far
